alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southern Wilkinson, southern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Nicklesville to near Tarversville, and moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Jeffersonville, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Marion, Coley Station, Tarversville, Bullard, Nicklesville, Magnolia, Royal, District Path, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Rebie, Cary, Porter, and Paulk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
